name: hue
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: hue
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: (a degree of lightness, darkness, strength, etc. of) a colour

example.eg: In the Caribbean waters there are fish of every hue.
example.egtrans: 加勒比海水域中的鱼五颜六色。

dsense.name: hue
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: Politicians of all hues wish to get sleaze off the agenda so that they can discuss the real issues.
example.egtrans: 各个党派的与会者都希望将那些卑劣之事从议事日程中去掉，这样他们就可以讨论真正的问题了。
